root.name: Don't Look Back
root.description: Don't Look Back was a flash game made by Terry Cavanagh who is probably most well know for his games VVVVVV and Super Hexagon.It is a short game with a very limited red/black color palette. You play a human character who moves through a screen-by-screen world fighting monsters and dealing with typical platformer fare. According to Wikipedia The game is an interpretation of the Orpheus and Eurydice legend.Halfway through the game you are introduced to a new mechanic that has very much to do with the title of this game.
